actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

actions.subcommittee: Arms Control, International Security and Science
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Arms Control, International Security and Science.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Arms Control, International Security and Science

official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress on the application of Section 3 of the War Powers Act to the April 14, 1986, U.S. raid against Libya.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that the President did not comply with the War Powers Act when he ordered the April 14, 1986, attack on Libya. Urges the President to comply with such Act in the future.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress on the application of Section 3 of the War Powers Act to the April 14, 1986, U.S. raid against Libya.
